00057 void VitreReactor::handleInit() {
00058   boost::asio::ip::tcp::resolver resolver(get_io_service());
00059   boost::asio::ip::tcp::resolver::query 
00060     query(boost::asio::ip::tcp::v4(), m_host, m_port);
00061   boost::asio::ip::tcp::resolver::iterator 
00062     iterator = resolver.resolve(query),end;
00063   boost::system::error_code error = boost::asio::error::host_not_found;
00064 
00065   while (error && iterator != end) {
00066     m_socket.close();
00067     m_socket.connect(*iterator++, error);
00068   }
00069   if ( !error )
00070     syslog()<<"Connection to "<<m_host<<':'<<m_port<<" succeeded.";
00071 }

00073 void VitreReactor::send(std::string const &str) {
00074   uint32_t msg_len = htonl(str.length());
00075   boost::array<boost::asio::const_buffer, 2> msg = {
00076       {boost::asio::buffer(&msg_len, sizeof(msg_len)),
00077       boost::asio::buffer(str)} };
00078   try {
00079     m_socket.send(msg);
00080   } catch( std::exception &e) {
00081     syslog()<<" message failure : "<<e.what();
00082     m_socket.close();
00083   }
00084 }
